Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class VirtualView

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.VirtualView
All Implemented Interfaces:
Observer
public class VirtualView
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
This class is the view of the MVC pattern server's side

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    VirtualView​(SendMessageToClient sendMessageToClient)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(java.lang.String name, int age, int indexClient)
    This method adds the player: if the players are more than the possible players in the game, this method is going to remove the extra players
    void afterInitialization​(java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> connectionHandlersWaitingServerSide, java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> clientArray, int indexClient)
    This method is recall if there is a disconnection and the game has already started
    void afterStart​(java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> connectionHandlersWaitingServerSide, java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> clientArray, int indexClient)
    This method is recall if there is a disconnection before the game has started
    void askState()
    This method calls askState method in the controller class
    void askWantToPlay​(int indexClient)
    This method handles all the clients which are connecting at the beginning of the game
    void beforeInitializationFirstClient​(java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> connectionHandlersWaitingServerSide, int indexClient)
    This method is recall if there is a disconnection before the game has started and is the first client that has disconnected
    void beforeInitializationOtherClient​(java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> connectionHandlersWaitingServerSide, int indexClient)
    This method is recall if there is a disconnection before the game has started and a client different from the first has disconnected
    void buildBeforeMove​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker, boolean wantToBuild)
    This method sends the request to build if the player chooses to build before worker move, otherwise calls updateBasicTurn method
    void buildBlock​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int row, int column, boolean firstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int indexPossibleBlock)
    This method controls if the box given by the player is reachable: if it is, the method calls the buildBlock method in the controller class, otherwise it sends an update of the board and sends again the request to choose a reachable box
    void canBuild​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method calls canBuild method in the controller class
    void canBuildSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method calls canBuildSpecialTurn method in the controller class
    void canMove()
    This method calls the canMove method in the controller class
    void canMoveSpecialTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method calls the canMoveSpecialTurn method in the controller class
    void checkWin​(AskMoveEvent askMoveEvent, int clientIndex)
    This method calls the checkWin method in the controller class
    void checkWinAfterBuild​(AskBuildEvent askBuildEvent)
    This method calls checkWinAfterBuild in the controller class
    void close​(int indexClient)
    This method receive the notify of the connection closing
    void closeGame()
    This method closes all the client and invokes reset method
    void controlStillOpen​(int indexClient, boolean beforeStart)
    This method controls if a client is still open
    void getCards()
    This method sends all the cards to the first player
    java.util.ArrayList<Player> getPlayerArray()
    this method return the array of player
    AskWorkerToMoveEvent getWorkersPos​(int indexPlayer, boolean firstMove, boolean canMove)
    This method sends a message memorizing the positions of the player workers
    void initializeWorker​(Box box1, Box box2)
    This method calls the initializeWorker method in the controller class
    boolean isReachable​(int row, int column)
    This method tells if a box is reachable by a worker
    void move​(int rowStart, int columnStart, int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove, boolean firstTime)
    This method controls if the box given by the player is reachable: if it is, the method calls the movePlayer method in the controller, otherwise it sends an update of the board and sends again the request to choose a reachable box
    void printHeartBeat​(int indexClient)
    This method calls heartbeat method in the controller class
    void reset()
    This method resets the arrays in echoServer class
    boolean setBoxBuilding​(int indexWorker)
    This method calls setBoxBuilding method in the controller class
    void setBoxReachable​(int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove, boolean isReady)
    This method calls the setBoxReachable method in the controller class if the player didn't choose definitively the worker, otherwise calls the canBuildBeforeWorkerMove method in the controller
    void setCard​(int godCard)
    This method sets the card chosen by the player
    void setNPlayers​(int npLayer)
    This method sets the number of players and sends the requests of player information
    void setTempCard​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> tempCard)
    This method sets the two or three cards chosen by the first player
    void startGame()
    This method calls startGame method in the controller class
    void stopWatching​(java.util.ArrayList<ConnectionHandlerServerSide> clientArray, int indexClient)
    This method is recall if there is a disconnection and the player chooses to watch the game
    void subscribe()
    this method is used to subscribe to the model
    void updateAskBuildBeforeMove​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method sends a request where the player can choose to build before worker move or not
    void updateAskState​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer)
    This method sends an update about player index to the players
    void updateBasicTurn​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method sends a message where requires to choose a worker to move
    void updateBoard​(boolean reach)
    This method sends an update of the board to the players
    void updateBuild​(AskBuildEvent askBuildEvent, int clientIndex)
    This method sends an update of the board and checks if a player has won
    void updateCanBuild​(int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker)
    This method sends an update of the board and the request to build a block
    void updateContinueBuild​(AskBuildEvent askBuildEvent)
    This method sends the possibility to build again a block if the player has a God with this ability, otherwise calls canMove method
    void updateContinueMove​(AskMoveEvent askMoveEvent)
    This method sends the possibility to move again the worker if the player has a God with this ability, otherwise calls canBuild method
    void updateControlSetNPlayer()
    This method controls if the first player sets the number of player in the game
    void updateInitializeWorker​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer)
    This method sends an update of the board and the request to choose the worker to move, if the first player has to play; otherwise sends the request to initialize the workers
    void updateLoser​(int indexClient)
    This method sends a loss message to the player who has lost
    void updateMove​(AskMoveEvent askMoveEvent, int clientIndex)
    This method sends an update of the board and checks if the player wins with the worker move
    void updateNewAddPlayer​(int indexClient)
    This method sends another request of player information to the client
    void updateNotInitializeWorker​(int indexClient)
    This method sends another request to initialize the workers, if the player chooses an occupied box
    void updateNotReachable​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer, int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
    This method sends an update of the board and ask for another worker to move because this one can't move
    void updatePlayer()
    This method starts the game and sends an update to the players
    void updateReachable​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer, int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
    This method sends an update of the board and if it is not the second move, it sends again the request to initialize the workers
    void updateSetBuilding()
    This method sends an update of the board
    void updateSpecialTurn​(int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove)
    This method tells that the player can build before the worker move
    void updateStartTurn()
    This method starts the turn of the next player sending the request to choose a worker
    void updateTempCard​(int clientIndex)
    This method sends the two or three cards to the player and he has to choose one.
    void updateUnreachableClient​(int indexClient)
    This method calls controlStillOpen method because the client doesn't send a response
    void updateWhoHasLost​(int loserClient)
    This method sends a message to the players who are still in the game saying which player has lost
    void updateWin​(int indexClient)
    This method sends a message of victory to the player who has won

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • updateTempCard

      public void updateTempCard​(int clientIndex)
      This method sends the two or three cards to the player and he has to choose one. When each player chose a cards, it sends the board and the request to initialize the workers to the first player of the game
      Specified by:
      updateTempCard in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      clientIndex - client index who is playing

      Parameters:

    • isReachable

      public boolean isReachable​(int row, int column)
      This method tells if a box is reachable by a worker
      Parameters:
      row - row of the box where the worker wants to move or to build
      column - column of the box where the worker wants to move or to build
      Returns:
      true if the box is reachable, otherwise returns false

      Parameters:
      indexWorker - worker index that the player wants to move
      rowWorker - row of the box where the worker is
      columnWorker - column of the box where the worker is

    • setBoxReachable

      public void setBoxReachable​(int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove, boolean isReady)
      This method calls the setBoxReachable method in the controller class if the player didn't choose definitively the worker, otherwise calls the canBuildBeforeWorkerMove method in the controller
      Parameters:
      row - row of the box where the worker is
      column - column of the box where the worker is
      indexWorkerToMove - worker index that the player wants to move
      isReady - boolean that identifies if the player has chosen the worker or not

    • updateReachable

      public void updateReachable​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer, int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
      This method sends an update of the board and if it is not the second move, it sends again the request to initialize the workers
      Specified by:
      updateReachable in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who is playing
      indexPlayer - player index
      indexWorker - worker index that the player wants to move
      secondMove - boolean that identifies if it is the first or the second move

    • updateNotReachable

      public void updateNotReachable​(int indexClient, int indexPlayer, int indexWorker, boolean secondMove)
      Description copied from interface: Observer
      This method sends an update of the board and ask for another worker to move because this one can't move
      Specified by:
      updateNotReachable in interface Observer
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who is playing
      indexPlayer - player index
      indexWorker - worker index that the player wants to move
      secondMove - boolean that identifies if it is the first or the second move

    • getWorkersPos

      public AskWorkerToMoveEvent getWorkersPos​(int indexPlayer, boolean firstMove, boolean canMove)
      This method sends a message memorizing the positions of the player workers
      Parameters:
      indexPlayer - player index who is playing
      firstMove - boolean that identifies if it is the first time for this player
      canMove - boolean if the worker can make a move
      Returns:
      object with the positions of the player workers

    • move

      public void move​(int rowStart, int columnStart, int row, int column, int indexWorkerToMove, boolean firstTime)
      This method controls if the box given by the player is reachable: if it is, the method calls the movePlayer method in the controller, otherwise it sends an update of the board and sends again the request to choose a reachable box
      Parameters:
      rowStart - row of the box where the worker is
      columnStart - column of the box where the worker is
      row - row of the box where the player wants to move the worker
      column - column of the box where the player wants to move the worker
      indexWorkerToMove - worker index that the player wants to move
      firstTime - boolean that identifies if it is the first player build or the second

      Parameters:

      column - column of the box where the worker is
      indexWorkerToMove - worker index that the player wants to move

    • buildBlock

      public void buildBlock​(int indexClient, int indexWorker, int rowWorker, int columnWorker, int row, int column, boolean firstTime, boolean isSpecialTurn, int indexPossibleBlock)
      This method controls if the box given by the player is reachable: if it is, the method calls the buildBlock method in the controller class, otherwise it sends an update of the board and sends again the request to choose a reachable box
      Parameters:
      indexClient - client index who is playing
      indexWorker - worker index that has to build
      rowWorker - row of the box where the worker is
      columnWorker - column of the box where the worker is
      row - row of the box where the player wants to build
      column - column of the box where the player wants to build
      firstTime - boolean that identifies if it is the first player build or the second
      isSpecialTurn - boolean that identifies if the player has built before worker move
      indexPossibleBlock - index of the block that the player wants to build
